mapper.sql: _role.id id, _role.name name, _role.code code, _role.role_type roleType, _role.role_status roleStatus, _role.version version, _role.create_time createTime, _role.modify_time modifyTime, _role.comment comment
left join UC_RoleAuthRelation _roleAuthRelation on _roleAuthRelation.role_id=_role.id left join UC_UserRoleRelation _userRoleRelation on _userRoleRelation.role_id=_role.id
inner join UC_Role _role on _role.id=_userRoleRelation.role_id inner join UC_User _user on _user.id=_userRoleRelation.user_id

_organization.id id, _organization.parent_id parentId, _organization.parent_name parentName, _organization.org_type orgType, _organization.code code, _organization.name name, _organization.short_name shortName, _organization.register_name registerName, _organization.office_phone officePhone, _organization.fax fax, _organization.post_code postCode, _organization.address address, _organization.tree_level treeLevel, _organization.tree_path treePath, _organization.is_child_node isChildNode, _organization.is_delete isDelete, _organization.version version, _organization.create_time createTime, _organization.modify_time modifyTime, _organization.comment comment

_user.id id, _user.org_id orgId, _user.org_ids orgIds, _user.account account, _user.password password, _user.org_name orgName, _user.org_code orgCode, _user.user_type userType, _user.is_admin isAdmin, _user.is_position isPosition, _user.name name, _user.mobile_phone mobilePhone, _user.email email, _user.office_phone officePhone, _user.gender gender, _user.birthday birthday, _user.head head, _user.signature signature, _user.user_status userStatus, _user.version version, _user.create_time createTime, _user.modify_time modifyTime, _user.comment comment
inner join UC_Role _role on _role.id=_roleAuthRelation.role_id inner join UC_Authorization _authorization on _authorization.id=_roleAuthRelation.auth_id

_authorization.id id, _authorization.view_config_id viewConfigId, _authorization.parent_id parentId, _authorization.code code, _authorization.parent_code parentCode, _authorization.parent_name parentName, _authorization.tree_level treeLevel, _authorization.tree_path treePath, _authorization.name name, _authorization.wildcard_path wildcardPath, _authorization.model_name modelName, _authorization.entity_name entityName, _authorization.method_name methodName, _authorization.view_type viewType, _authorization.view_name viewName, _authorization.url_path urlPath, _authorization.template_name templateName, _authorization.model_file_name modelFileName, _authorization.menu_type menuType, _authorization.is_child_node isChildNode, _authorization.icon_path iconPath, _authorization.auth_type authType, _authorization.params params, _authorization.version version, _authorization.create_time createTime, _authorization.modify_time modifyTime, _authorization.comment comment

_viewConfig.id id, _viewConfig.table_id tableId, _viewConfig.table_ids tableIds, _viewConfig.tree_table_id treeTableId, _viewConfig.auth_parent_code authParentCode, _viewConfig.auth_code authCode, _viewConfig.auth_name authName, _viewConfig.auth_parent_names authParentNames, _viewConfig.auth_level authLevel, _viewConfig.table_code tableCode, _viewConfig.table_name tableName, _viewConfig.tree_table_code treeTableCode, _viewConfig.tree_table_name treeTableName, _viewConfig.entity_name entityName, _viewConfig.tree_entity_name treeEntityName, _viewConfig.method_name methodName, _viewConfig.view_type viewType, _viewConfig.view_parent_path viewParentPath, _viewConfig.view_name viewName, _viewConfig.view_template_name viewTemplateName, _viewConfig.view_template_path viewTemplatePath, _viewConfig.js_template_content jsTemplateContent, _viewConfig.page_template_content pageTemplateContent, _viewConfig.view_grid_param viewGridParam, _viewConfig.is_shrinktofit isShrinktofit, _viewConfig.parent_view_position parentViewPosition, _viewConfig.jump_method_name jumpMethodName, _viewConfig.data_method_name dataMethodName, _viewConfig.is_page_back isPageBack, _viewConfig.is_config isConfig, _viewConfig.config_time configTime, _viewConfig.is_cenerate isCenerate, _viewConfig.generate_time generateTime, _viewConfig.version version, _viewConfig.create_time createTime, _viewConfig.modify_time modifyTime, _viewConfig.comment comment

_viewFieldConfig.id id, _viewFieldConfig.view_id viewId, _viewFieldConfig.auth_id authId, _viewFieldConfig.table_id tableId, _viewFieldConfig.column_id columnId, _viewFieldConfig.data_category_id dataCategoryId, _viewFieldConfig.auth_code authCode, _viewFieldConfig.auth_name authName, _viewFieldConfig.table_code tableCode, _viewFieldConfig.table_name tableName, _viewFieldConfig.entity_name entityName, _viewFieldConfig.field_index fieldIndex, _viewFieldConfig.field_code fieldCode, _viewFieldConfig.field_name fieldName, _viewFieldConfig.field_label fieldLabel, _viewFieldConfig.field_type fieldType, _viewFieldConfig.field_show_type fieldShowType, _viewFieldConfig.field_frozen fieldFrozen, _viewFieldConfig.field_width fieldWidth, _viewFieldConfig.field_align fieldAlign, _viewFieldConfig.field_datefmt fieldDatefmt, _viewFieldConfig.field_formatter fieldFormatter, _viewFieldConfig.field_formatter_code fieldFormatterCode, _viewFieldConfig.field_hidden fieldHidden, _viewFieldConfig.field_key fieldKey, _viewFieldConfig.field_sortable fieldSortable, _viewFieldConfig.field_sort fieldSort, _viewFieldConfig.field_json fieldJson, _viewFieldConfig.is_prompt_field isPromptField, _viewFieldConfig.is_tree_list_field isTreeListField, _viewFieldConfig.search_type searchType, _viewFieldConfig.search_group searchGroup, _viewFieldConfig.search_operator searchOperator, _viewFieldConfig.search_field_show_type searchFieldShowType, _viewFieldConfig.search_regular searchRegular, _viewFieldConfig.is_add isAdd, _viewFieldConfig.add_time addTime, _viewFieldConfig.version version, _viewFieldConfig.create_time createTime, _viewFieldConfig.modify_time modifyTime, _viewFieldConfig.comment comment

inner join SC_ViewConfig _viewConfig on _viewConfig.id=_viewFieldConfig.view_id inner join SC_TableColumn _tableColumn on _tableColumn.id=_viewFieldConfig.column_id inner join SC_FieldDataCategory _fieldDataCategory on _fieldDataCategory.id=_viewFieldConfig.data_category_id
